enhanced_by.reason: The margin transfer operation requires the margin account to be enabled for the sub-account.
Fetching sub-account assets can provide context about the available assets before performing a margin transfer.
The marginAccount method provides detailed information about the sub-account's margin account, which can be used to verify the success of the margin transfer operation.
The marginAccountSummary method provides a summary of the sub-account's margin accounts, which can be used to verify the overall state after the margin transfer.
